title: Papers: Man Utd open Rashford contract talks
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Wednesday's national newspapers...

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Sunderland beaten; Forest Green go nine clear
shortDescription: Sunderland missed the chance to go top of Sky Bet League One and finished with 10 men as Chris Maguire's hat-trick set Lincoln on their way to a 3-1 victory.

title: Papa John's Trophy: Arsenal U21 thump Chelsea to reach last-eight
shortDescription: Arsenal's U21s advanced to the quarter-finals of the Papa John's Trophy on Tuesday night, after a 4-1 win over Chelsea's U21s at the Emirates Stadium.

title: Papa John's Trophy: The state of play
shortDescription: As the 2021/22 Papa John's Trophy reaches its latter stages, we bring you the state of play, upcoming fixtures and the schedule for the remainder of the tournament.

title: January window: All the done deals
shortDescription: See all the done deals across England and Scotland, plus key moves around Europe...

title: Impressive Saints ease past Brentford in front of new owner
shortDescription: Southampton hit four goals in a Premier League game for the first time this season as they thrashed Brentford 4-1 at St Mary's.

title: Oldham owner looking to sell after receiving death threat
shortDescription: Controversial Oldham owner Abdallah Lemsagam has opened talks with interested parties to sell the struggling club after receiving a death threat, including a bullet.

title: AFCON: Late penalty miss denies Guinea-Bissau vs Sudan
shortDescription: Sudan goalkeeper Ali Abou Achrine saved a late penalty to ensure they secured a 0-0 draw with Guinea-Bissau in Garoua on Tuesday.

title: Aston Villa confirm Coutinho loan deal
shortDescription: Aston Villa have confirmed the signing of Philippe Coutinho on loan from Barcelona until the end of the season.

title: Burnley striker Wood to undergo Newcastle medical
shortDescription: Chris Wood will undergo a medical with Newcastle on Wednesday as the striker finalises personal terms for a £25m move from Burnley.

title: Haaland to decide future this month | Man City in pole position
shortDescription: Manchester City retain pole position if Erling Haaland decides to move to the Premier League this summer.

title: Spurs approach Lingard over summer transfer
shortDescription: Tottenham are keen to sign Jesse Lingard and have approached his representatives about a summer move.

title: AFCON: Salah's Egypt beaten by Nigeria in opener
shortDescription: Kelechi Iheanacho's excellent first-half goal handed Nigeria a deserved 1-0 victory over a below-par Egypt in their Africa Cup of Nations Group D clash in Garoua.

title: Wednesday at AFCON: Tunisia, Ivory Coast get started
shortDescription: Dates, kick-off times and host cities - here's the full schedule for AFCON 2021.

title: EFL goals and highlights
shortDescription: Watch highlights from all of Tuesday's matches in the Sky Bet Championship, League One and League Two here.

title: Arsenal retain strong interest in Fiorentina striker Vlahovic
shortDescription: Arsenal retain a strong interest in Dusan Vlahovic but will find it difficult to complete a deal for the Fiorentina striker this month.

title: Homophobic 'rent boy' slur leaves fans open to prosecution, says CPS
shortDescription: The CPS says use of the term 'rent boy' is considered a homophobic slur and therefore capable of amounting to a hate crime, leaving open the threat of prosecution.

title: Vlahovic: Haaland's 'twin' who is destined for PL
shortDescription: Dusan Vlahovic continues to impress after a record-matching 33 Serie A goals in 2021. Is the Premier League his next destination?

title: Tottenham vs Chelsea live on Sky: Can Spurs stage comeback?
shortDescription: Team news, stats and how to watch ahead of Tottenham vs Chelsea in the second leg of the Carabao Cup semi-finals on Wednesday; kick-off 7.45pm.

title: Patten on Villa loan: 'I really appreciate working with female coaches'
shortDescription: Anna Patten is enjoying new horizons during her loan spell at Aston Villa, including working under an experienced female coach in Carla Ward.
